short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to filter out news feed items based on taste

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
News feed filter uses AI to give you control over X (formerly twitter) 's news feed. It filters out any tweets that you may not be looking for eg., political, sports, etc., so that you have control over the content you read on X (formerly twitter). News feed filter increases the signal to noise ratio for you so that you stay productive.

News feed filter is completely free for a limited time, requires no signup, and stores no data at all about your tweets.

Have queries or feedback? Please send me an email at gauravwaghmare30@gmail.com
